page.title: 02Sennen Lifeboat
page.content: {Sennen lifeboat house}is the biggest in{England}because it has two slipways to allow for the rocks.The{Diana White is 12 metres long and weighs 12 tonnes and she has two engines which are 60 horse power each.She has a crew of seven men and they are all volunteers .The{Diana White}has been stationed at {Sennen Cove}for 11 years.Since 1979 the{Diana White}has saved about 365 lives.One famous rescue was when the {Diana White}went to rescue the Icelandic cargo ship the{Tungufoss.}On the{Diana White }were Cedric Johnson, Derek Angove,Maurice Hutchens coxswain Philip Shannon,John Pender,Tim George and Terry Greene.For this rescue they received a silver medal each which is the highest Icelandic medal ever awarded .
